edited_stories.edited_story_text: I was teary-eyed while I watched the cadets from West Point practice marching.  They were practicing for the graduation ceremony.  It was nice to see the female cadets marching with the male cadets.  They all stood at attention when the general approached the podium to give a speech.  I was so proud when my son received his stripes.
